channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: ABC News Overnight
channel.desc: Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Michael Tetlow brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: The Business
channel.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: The World
channel.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: DW News
channel.desc: The latest international news and the day's top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: Asia News Week
channel.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: ABC News Regional
channel.desc: Amy Culpitt presents a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. Reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: News Breakfast
channel.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Bridget Brennan bring you the latest news, overnight developments and top stories, plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Emma Rebellato with weather.

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is either off air, or it has no EPG yet. If you think it is broken, please contact us on https://epg.best
